QuestData.Title: Allies in the Shadows
QuestData.Description: The Shado-Pan arrived here before we did, and they are already at work undermining the Thunder King's forces.$B$BI want you to meet with Taran Zhu, the leader of the Shado-Pan, and offer your services on behalf of the Sunreavers. I doubt he is truly in need of the aid, but the gesture holds importance in itself.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Taran Zhu in Bleak Hollow.
